BatchGetMemberAccountDetails.name: BatchGetMemberAccountDetails
BatchGetMemberAccountDetails.documentation: Grants permission to view an existing membership.

CancelMembership.name: CancelMembership
CancelMembership.documentation: Grants permissions to cancel an existing membership.

CloseCase.name: CloseCase
CloseCase.documentation: Grants permission to close an existing case.

CreateCase.name: CreateCase
CreateCase.documentation: Grants permission to create a new case.

CreateCaseComment.name: CreateCaseComment
CreateCaseComment.documentation: Grants permission to add a comment to an existing case.

CreateMembership.name: CreateMembership
CreateMembership.documentation: Grants permissions to create a new membership.

GetCase.name: GetCase
GetCase.documentation: Grant permission to view a designated case.

GetCaseAttachmentDownloadUrl.name: GetCaseAttachmentDownloadUrl
GetCaseAttachmentDownloadUrl.documentation: Grants permission to obtain an Amazon S3 presigned URL to download an attachment.

GetCaseAttachmentUploadUrl.name: GetCaseAttachmentUploadUrl
GetCaseAttachmentUploadUrl.documentation: Grants permission to upload an attachment to a case.

GetMembership.name: GetMembership
GetMembership.documentation: Grants permission to get details of a designated service membership.

ListCaseEdits.name: ListCaseEdits
ListCaseEdits.documentation: Grants permissions to view the aidt log for edits made to a designated case.

ListCases.name: ListCases
ListCases.documentation: Grants permission to list all cases the requester has access to.

ListComments.name: ListComments
ListComments.documentation: Grants permissions to list and view comments for a designated case.

ListMemberships.name: ListMemberships
ListMemberships.documentation: Grants permission to query the memberships a principal has access to.

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.documentation: Grants permission to view currently configured tags on a resource.

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.documentation: Grants permission to add a tag(s) to a designated resource.

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.documentation: Grants permission to remove a tag(s) from a designate resource.

UpdateCase.name: UpdateCase
UpdateCase.documentation: Grants permission to update an existing case.

UpdateCaseComment.name: UpdateCaseComment
UpdateCaseComment.documentation: Grants permission to update an existing case comment.

UpdateCaseStatus.name: UpdateCaseStatus
UpdateCaseStatus.documentation: Grants permission to update the status for a designated cases. Options include Submitted | Detection and Analysis | Eradication, Containment and Recovery | Post-Incident Activities | Closed.

UpdateMembership.name: UpdateMembership
UpdateMembership.documentation: Grants access to UpdateMembership to change membership configuration.

UpdateResolverType.name: UpdateResolverType
UpdateResolverType.documentation:
Grants permission to update the resolver type for a case.

This is a one-way action and cannot be reversed.

Options include self-supported > AWS-supported.

membershipId.documentation: Required element used in combination with BatchGetMemberAccountDetails to identify the membership ID to query.

accountIds.documentation: Optional element to query the membership relationship status to a provided list of account IDs.

items.documentation: The response element providing responses for requests to GetMembershipAccountDetails.

errors.documentation: The response element providing errors messages for requests to GetMembershipAccountDetails.

membershipId.documentation: Required element used in combination with CancelMembershipRequest to identify the membership ID to cancel.
The response element providing responses for requests to CancelMembershipRequest.

caseId.documentation: Required element used in combination with CloseCase to identify the case ID to close.

caseStatus.documentation: A response element providing responses for requests to CloseCase. This element responds with the case status following the action.

closedDate.documentation: A response element providing responses for requests to CloseCase. This element responds with the case closure date following the action.

resourceId.documentation: Element providing the ID of the resource affected.

resourceType.documentation: Element providing the type of the resource affected.

caseId.documentation: Required element used in combination with CreateCaseComment to specify a case ID.

clientToken.documentation: An optional element used in combination with CreateCaseComment.

body.documentation: Required element used in combination with CreateCaseComment to add content for the new comment.

commentId.documentation: Response element indicating the new comment ID.

clientToken.documentation: Required element used in combination with CreateCase.

resolverType.documentation: Required element used in combination with CreateCase to identify the resolver type. Available resolvers include self-supported | aws-supported.

title.documentation: Required element used in combination with CreateCase to provide a title for the new case.

description.documentation: Required element used in combination with CreateCase to provide a description for the new case.

engagementType.documentation: Required element used in combination with CreateCase to provide an engagement type for the new cases. Available engagement types include Security Incident | Investigation

reportedIncidentStartDate.documentation: Required element used in combination with CreateCase to provide an initial start date for the unauthorized activity.

impactedAccounts.documentation: Required element used in combination with CreateCase to provide a list of impacted accounts.

watchers.documentation: Required element used in combination with CreateCase to provide a list of entities to receive notifications for case updates.

threatActorIpAddresses.documentation: An optional element used in combination with CreateCase to provide a list of suspicious internet protocol addresses associated with unauthorized activity.

impactedServices.documentation: An optional element used in combination with CreateCase to provide a list of services impacted.

impactedAwsRegions.documentation: An optional element used in combination with CreateCase to provide a list of impacted regions.

tags.documentation: An optional element used in combination with CreateCase to add customer specified tags to a case.

caseId.documentation: A response element providing responses for requests to CreateCase. This element responds with the case ID.

clientToken.documentation: An optional element used in combination with CreateMembership.

membershipName.documentation: Required element use in combination with CreateMembership to create a name for the membership.

incidentResponseTeam.documentation: Required element use in combination with CreateMembership to add customer incident response team members and trusted partners to the membership.

optInFeatures.documentation: Optional element to enable the monitoring and investigation opt-in features for the service.

membershipId.documentation: Response element for CreateMembership providing the newly created membership ID.

caseId.documentation: Required element for GetCaseAttachmentDownloadUrl to identify the case ID for downloading an attachment from.

attachmentId.documentation: Required element for GetCaseAttachmentDownloadUrl to identify the attachment ID for downloading an attachment.

attachmentPresignedUrl.documentation: Response element providing the Amazon S3 presigned URL to download an attachment.

caseId.documentation: Required element for GetCaseAttachmentUploadUrl to identify the case ID for uploading an attachment to.

fileName.documentation: Required element for GetCaseAttachmentUploadUrl to identify the file name of the attachment to upload.

contentLength.documentation: Required element for GetCaseAttachmentUploadUrl to identify the size od the file attachment.

attachmentPresignedUrl.documentation: Response element providing the Amazon S3 presigned UTL to upload the attachment.

caseId.documentation: Required element for GetCase to identify the requested case ID.

title.documentation: Response element for GetCase that provides the case title.

caseArn.documentation: Response element for GetCase that provides the case ARN

description.documentation: Response element for GetCase that provides contents of the case description.

caseStatus.documentation: Response element for GetCase that provides the case status. Options for statuses include Submitted | Detection and Analysis | Eradication, Containment and Recovery | Post-Incident Activities | Closed

engagementType.documentation: Response element for GetCase that provides the engagement type. Options for engagement type include Active Security Event | Investigations

reportedIncidentStartDate.documentation: Response element for GetCase that provides the customer provided incident start date.

actualIncidentStartDate.documentation: Response element for GetCase that provides the actual incident start date as identified by data analysis during the investigation.

impactedAwsRegions.documentation: Response element for GetCase that provides the impacted regions.

threatActorIpAddresses.documentation: Response element for GetCase that provides a list of suspicious IP addresses associated with unauthorized activity.

pendingAction.documentation: Response element for GetCase that provides identifies the case is waiting on customer input.

impactedAccounts.documentation: Response element for GetCase that provides a list of impacted accounts.

watchers.documentation: Response element for GetCase that provides a list of Watchers added to the case.

createdDate.documentation: Response element for GetCase that provides the date the case was created.

lastUpdatedDate.documentation: Response element for GetCase that provides the date a case was last modified.

closureCode.documentation: Response element for GetCase that provides the summary code for why a case was closed.

resolverType.documentation: Response element for GetCase that provides the current resolver types. Options include self-supported | AWS-supported.

impactedServices.documentation: Response element for GetCase that provides a list of impacted services.

caseAttachments.documentation: Response element for GetCase that provides a list of current case attachments.

closedDate.documentation: Response element for GetCase that provides the date a specified case was closed.

membershipId.documentation: Required element for GetMembership to identify the membership ID to query.
Response element for GetMembership that provides the queried membership ID.

accountId.documentation: Response element for GetMembership that provides the configured account for managing the membership.

region.documentation: Response element for GetMembership that provides the configured region for managing the membership.

membershipName.documentation: Response element for GetMembership that provides the configured membership name.

membershipArn.documentation: Response element for GetMembership that provides the membership ARN.

membershipStatus.documentation: Response element for GetMembership that provides the current membership status.

membershipActivationTimestamp.documentation: Response element for GetMembership that provides the configured membership activation timestamp.

membershipDeactivationTimestamp.documentation: Response element for GetMembership that provides the configured membership name deactivation timestamp.

customerType.documentation: Response element for GetMembership that provides the configured membership type. Options include Standalone | Organizations.

numberOfAccountsCovered.documentation: Response element for GetMembership that provides the number of accounts in the membership.

incidentResponseTeam.documentation: Response element for GetMembership that provides the configured membership incident response team members.

optInFeatures.documentation: Response element for GetMembership that provides the if opt-in features have been enabled.

retryAfterSeconds.documentation: Element providing advice to clients on when the call can be safely retried.

nextToken.documentation: Optional element for a customer provided token.

maxResults.documentation: Optional element to identify how many results to obtain. There is a maximum value of 25.

caseId.documentation: Required element used with ListCaseEdits to identify the case to query.

items.documentation: Response element for ListCaseEdits that includes the action, eventtimestamp, message, and principal for the response.

total.documentation: Response element for ListCaseEdits that identifies the total number of edits.

maxResults.documentation: Optional element for ListCases to limit the number of responses.

items.documentation: Response element for ListCases that includes caseARN, caseID, caseStatus, closedDate, createdDate, engagementType, lastUpdatedDate, pendingAction, resolverType, and title for each response.

total.documentation: Response element for ListCases providing the total number of responses.

maxResults.documentation: Optional element for ListComments to limit the number of responses.

caseId.documentation: Required element for ListComments to designate the case to query.

items.documentation: Response element for ListComments providing the body, commentID, createDate, creator, lastUpdatedBy and lastUpdatedDate for each response.

total.documentation: Response element for ListComments identifying the number of responses.

maxResults.documentation: Request element for ListMemberships to limit the number of responses.

items.documentation: Request element for ListMemberships including the accountID, membershipARN, membershipID, membershipStatus, and region for each response.

resourceArn.documentation: Required element for ListTagsForResource to provide the ARN to identify a specific resource.

tags.documentation: Response element for ListTagsForResource providing content for each configured tag.

resourceId.documentation: Element that provides the ID of the resource affected.

resourceType.documentation: Element that provides the type of the resource affected.

serviceCode.documentation: Element that provides the originating service who made the call.

quotaCode.documentation: Element that provides the quota that was exceeded.

resourceArn.documentation: Required element for TagResource to identify the ARN for the resource to add a tag to.

tags.documentation: Required element for ListTagsForResource to provide the content for a tag.

serviceCode.documentation: Element providing the service code of the originating service.

quotaCode.documentation: Element providing the quota of the originating service.

retryAfterSeconds.documentation: Element providing advice to clients on when the call can be safely retried.

resourceArn.documentation: Required element for UnTagResource to identify the ARN for the resource to remove a tag from.

tagKeys.documentation: Required element for UnTagResource to identify tag to remove.

caseId.documentation: Required element for UpdateCaseComment to identify the case ID containing the comment to be updated.

commentId.documentation: Required element for UpdateCaseComment to identify the case ID to be updated.

body.documentation: Required element for UpdateCaseComment to identify the content for the comment to be updated.

commentId.documentation: Response element for UpdateCaseComment providing the updated comment ID.

body.documentation: Response element for UpdateCaseComment providing the updated comment content.

caseId.documentation: Required element for UpdateCase to identify the case ID for updates.

title.documentation: Optional element for UpdateCase to provide content for the title field.

description.documentation: Optional element for UpdateCase to provide content for the description field.

reportedIncidentStartDate.documentation: Optional element for UpdateCase to provide content for the customer reported incident start date field.

actualIncidentStartDate.documentation: Optional element for UpdateCase to provide content for the incident start date field.

engagementType.documentation: Optional element for UpdateCase to provide content for the engagement type field. Available engagement types include Security Incident | Investigation.

watchersToAdd.documentation: Optional element for UpdateCase to provide content to add additional watchers to a case.

watchersToDelete.documentation: Optional element for UpdateCase to provide content to remove existing watchers from a case.

threatActorIpAddressesToAdd.documentation: Optional element for UpdateCase to provide content to add additional suspicious IP addresses related to a case.

threatActorIpAddressesToDelete.documentation: Optional element for UpdateCase to provide content to remove suspicious IP addresses from a case.

impactedServicesToAdd.documentation: Optional element for UpdateCase to provide content to add services impacted.

impactedServicesToDelete.documentation: Optional element for UpdateCase to provide content to remove services impacted.

impactedAwsRegionsToAdd.documentation: Optional element for UpdateCase to provide content to add regions impacted.

impactedAwsRegionsToDelete.documentation: Optional element for UpdateCase to provide content to remove regions impacted.

impactedAccountsToAdd.documentation: Optional element for UpdateCase to provide content to add accounts impacted.

impactedAccountsToDelete.documentation: Optional element for UpdateCase to provide content to add accounts impacted.

caseId.documentation: Required element for UpdateCaseStatus to identify the case to update.

caseStatus.documentation: Required element for UpdateCaseStatus to identify the status for a case. Options include Submitted | Detection and Analysis | Containment, Eradication and Recovery | Post-incident Activities.
Response element for UpdateCaseStatus showing the newly configured status.

membershipId.documentation: Required element for UpdateMembership to identify the membership to update.

membershipName.documentation: Optional element for UpdateMembership to update the membership name.

incidentResponseTeam.documentation: Optional element for UpdateMembership to update the membership name.

optInFeatures.documentation: Optional element for UpdateMembership to enable or disable opt-in features for the service.

caseId.documentation: Required element for UpdateResolverType to identify the case to update.

resolverType.documentation: Required element for UpdateResolverType to identify the new resolver.

caseId.documentation: Response element for UpdateResolver identifying the case ID being updated.

caseStatus.documentation: Response element for UpdateResolver identifying the current status of the case.

resolverType.documentation: Response element for UpdateResolver identifying the current resolver of the case.

reason.documentation: Element that provides the reason the request failed validation.

fieldList.documentation: Element that provides the list of field(s) that caused the error, if applicable.

documentation: This guide provides documents the action and response elements for customer use of the service.
